name: Aqualand 3D
description:
Welcome to Aqualand!

Can you be the best on this aquapark ?

- Balance the seesaw
- Be the best lifeguard and get paid
- Run on the water slide race and try to be the first
- Makes fruit juice blends
- Do the calculations for the cash register
- Count the money
- Land on platforms and reach finish line before other players
- Sort items in the same crates
- Dig in the sand to put the balls in the pool
